mapper.delete: delete from `user_group` where user_id=#{userId} and group_id=#{groupId}
mapper.select: select g.id, g.name from user_group u, `group` g where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.group_id = g.id
select u.id, u.nickname, u.image_key, u.email from user_group g, `user` u where g.group_id = #{id} and g.user_id = u.id
